sourcesContent: import React,{useState, useEffect} from "react" import ToastHeader from 'react-bootstrap/ToastHeader' import Toast from 'react-bootstrap/Toast' import ToastBody from 'react-bootstrap/ToastBody' import ToastContainer from 'react-bootstrap/ToastContainer' import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; function AlertDismissible() { const [show, setShow] = useState(false); return ( setShow(false)} show={show} delay={3000} autohide> Bootstrap 11 mins ago Woohoo, you're reading this text in a Toast! ); } export default AlertDismissible;
